snippet: A jury on Wednesday found a man guilty of child abuse for forcing his grandsons on grueling hikes in the Grand Canyon in searing heat even as they vomited and two of them repeatedly fell.
abstract: Jury finds Arizona man Christopher Alan Carlson guilty of child abuse for forcing his grandsons on grueling hikes in the Grand Canyon in searing heat, even as they vomited and two of them repeatedly fell.
